dcterms:creator: B. Mildenhall
P. P. Srinivasan
M. Tancik
J. T. Barron
R. Ramamoorthi
R. Ng
dcterms:description: The NeRF synthetic dataset consists of path-traced images of 8 objects that exhibit complicated geometry and realistic non-Lambertian materials. It is used for training and testing novel view synthesis methods.
dcterms:title: NeRF synthetic dataset

dcterms:creator: B. Mildenhall
P. P. Srinivasan
M. Tancik
J. T. Barron
R. Ramamoorthi
R. Ng
dcterms:description: The Real Forward-Facing dataset contains images captured with a handheld cellphone, used for evaluating novel view synthesis methods in real-world scenarios.
dcterms:title: Real Forward-Facing dataset

dcterms:creator: T. Neff
P. Stadlbauer
M. Parger
A. Kurz
J. H. Mueller
C. R. A. Chaitanya
A. S. Kaplanyan
M. Steinberger
dcterms:description: The DONeRF dataset includes synthetic data rendered using Blender and their Cycles path tracer, providing images for training, validation, and testing of neural radiance fields.
dcterms:title: DONeRF dataset
